item.title: If I were the Devil
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:8, topic:453585”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=556422.msg4073669#msg4073669 date=1344597000]

“Soon I could evict God from the courthouses, and then from the schoolhouses, and then from the houses of Congress”

its funny cuz under the constitution god shouldn’t be in any of those places to begin with

Yep.

Don’t you think it was pretty interesting to see how accurate this guy was? This was recorded in 1965.
[/quote]
As stated in the video, he didn’t predict anything, he only analysed the world arond him.[/quote]

Which goes to show how little things have actually changed over time, in the more down to earth sense.

Read full topic

tbh, I wish I was the devil >:|)>
